name: Stream Panel v2 (PostgreSQL)
changelog: v2.0.14: Fixed request_site_seasons schema (media_id, status_4k, created_at, updated_at columns)
v2.0.14: Fixed Plex Scanner timestamp format for PostgreSQL (Date.now() -> ISO string)
v2.0.13: Fixed duplicate tag error handling for PostgreSQL (user_tags_pkey constraint)
v2.0.12: Fixed user save error - skip RETURNING id for tables without id column (user_tags, tag_iptv_panels, etc.)
v2.0.11: Synced all development files - plex scanner PostgreSQL status values, request site legacy status fix, removed abandoned sticky header
v2.0.10: Fixed user creation error (missing show_iptv_movies/show_iptv_series columns)
v2.0.10: Fixed datetime interval conversion for minutes/hours/seconds/months/years
v2.0.9: Disabled sticky header temporarily for debugging
v2.0.8: Fixed sticky header - proper initialization and cache busting
v2.0.7: Fixed sticky header positioning - now flush with navbar, no extra checkbox row
v2.0.6: Fixed sticky table header CSS (was missing from v2.0.4)
v2.0.5: Fixed Kometa loadKometaInstances null element error in admin settings
v2.0.4: Sticky table header on Users page (desktop) - header stays visible when scrolling
v2.0.3: Fixed Request Site manifest.json 401 error (wrong URL path)
v2.0.2: Fixed Request Site Plex servers 500 error (missing last_recent_scan column)
v2.0.1: Fixed SQL syntax error when linking existing Plex users (INSERT OR REPLACE conversion)
v2.0.1: Fixed Plex Scanner missing request_site_media columns
Migrated from SQLite to PostgreSQL for improved performance and scalability
Added connection pooling for better concurrent request handling
Fixed all SQLite-specific function calls (datetime, json_extract, etc.)
Added proper boolean to integer conversion for PostgreSQL compatibility
Improved database transaction support
All existing features preserved from v1.x
migrationNotes: Use sqlite-to-postgres.js script to migrate existing data
